data_sources.description: Contains medal standings for various countries at the 2022 Commonwealth Games.
Contains the count of athletes participating in the 2022 Commonwealth Games.
Contains the event schedule for the 2022 Commonwealth Games.

data_variables.name: countries
data_variables.description: List of country names participating in the Commonwealth Games.

data_variables.name: men_gold
data_variables.description: List of gold medals won by men from each country.

data_variables.name: men_silver
data_variables.description: List of silver medals won by men from each country.

data_variables.name: men_bronze
data_variables.description: List of bronze medals won by men from each country.

data_variables.name: women_gold
data_variables.description: List of gold medals won by women from each country.

data_variables.name: women_silver
data_variables.description: List of silver medals won by women from each country.

data_variables.name: women_bronze
data_variables.description: List of bronze medals won by women from each country.

data_variables.name: mixed_gold
data_variables.description: List of gold medals won in mixed events.

data_variables.name: mixed_silver
data_variables.description: List of silver medals won in mixed events.

data_variables.name: mixed_bronze
data_variables.description: List of bronze medals won in mixed events.

data_variables.name: total_gold
data_variables.description: Total gold medals won by each country.

data_variables.name: total_silver
data_variables.description: Total silver medals won by each country.

data_variables.name: total_bronze
data_variables.description: Total bronze medals won by each country.

data_variables.name: total
data_variables.description: Total medals won by each country.

data_variables.name: athlete_count
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing counts of athletes from the 2022 Commonwealth Games.

data_variables.name: event_schedule
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the schedule of events for the 2022 Commonwealth Games.

data_flow.creation: Created using pd.DataFrame with various medal data lists.
Created using pd.read_html to scrape data from Wikipedia.
Created using pd.read_html to scrape data from Wikipedia.
